scenes.description: MC section: Kronii wraps up the main portion of the 3D showcase and says goodbye to the initial audience.
MC section: Kronii announces new merchandise and reads a heartfelt letter of appreciation to her fans.

subtitles.original: So...
subtitles.english: So...

subtitles.original: Sorry, I can't hear
subtitles.english: Sorry, I can't hear

subtitles.original:
because it seems like your mics
have suddenly stopped working.
subtitles.english:
because it seems like your mics
have suddenly stopped working.

subtitles.original: Oh, what a shame.
subtitles.english: Oh, what a shame.

subtitles.original: And oh, oh look at that. The show's ending.
subtitles.english: And oh, oh look at that. The show's ending.

subtitles.original: Oh, oh no, oh no.
subtitles.english: Oh, oh no, oh no.

subtitles.original: Thank you to everyone who tuned in
subtitles.english: Thank you to everyone who tuned in

subtitles.original: and stay safe out there.
subtitles.english: and stay safe out there.

subtitles.original: And remember, maybe next time,
subtitles.english: And remember, maybe next time,

subtitles.original:
you too could be right here,
standing where I'm standing.
subtitles.english:
you too could be right here,
standing where I'm standing.

subtitles.original: One day, maybe.
subtitles.english: One day, maybe.

subtitles.original: Nah, who am I kidding? Bye!
subtitles.english: Nah, who am I kidding? Bye!

subtitles.original: So, how was it? Aren't I just amazing?
subtitles.english: So, how was it? Aren't I just amazing?

subtitles.original: Thank you so much for watching up to this point.
subtitles.english: Thank you so much for watching up to this point.

subtitles.original: And now, a few announcements here.
subtitles.english: And now, a few announcements here.

subtitles.original: What do you think it's going to be? Let's see.
subtitles.english: What do you think it's going to be? Let's see.

subtitles.original: Bam!
subtitles.english: Bam!

subtitles.original: Warden's Capely Embrace Blanket
subtitles.english: Warden's Capely Embrace Blanket

subtitles.original: It's a blanket! And not just any blanket.
subtitles.english: It's a blanket! And not just any blanket.

subtitles.original:
It's inspired by my cape.
That's right. Look at this.
subtitles.english:
It's inspired by my cape.
That's right. Look at this.

subtitles.original: But, you'll have to wait a little bit longer.
subtitles.english: But, you'll have to wait a little bit longer.

subtitles.original: I know you want this cape ASAP,
subtitles.english: I know you want this cape ASAP,

subtitles.original: but you can get it after the 3D group collab.
subtitles.english: but you can get it after the 3D group collab.

subtitles.original: So keep an eye out for that, okay? Yay!
subtitles.english: So keep an eye out for that, okay? Yay!

subtitles.original: And now, you can join my club, Cape Gang. Woohoo!
subtitles.english: And now, you can join my club, Cape Gang. Woohoo!

subtitles.original: So, what are you waiting for? Go get it right now.
subtitles.english: So, what are you waiting for? Go get it right now.

subtitles.original: Don't you want this cape?
subtitles.english: Don't you want this cape?

subtitles.original:
It's going to be available
as soon as this showcase ends,
subtitles.english:
It's going to be available
as soon as this showcase ends,

subtitles.original: so keep an eye out for that, okay?
subtitles.english: so keep an eye out for that, okay?

subtitles.original: Um, but before we end things,
subtitles.english: Um, but before we end things,

subtitles.original: I have a short message for everyone.
subtitles.english: I have a short message for everyone.

subtitles.original: Yeah, I know. Ooh, sudden unplanned stuff. Oh my.
subtitles.english: Yeah, I know. Ooh, sudden unplanned stuff. Oh my.

subtitles.original: Okay, well, you guys want to see a magic trick?
subtitles.english: Okay, well, you guys want to see a magic trick?

subtitles.original: I don't have anything in my hands right now, but...
subtitles.english: I don't have anything in my hands right now, but...

subtitles.original: Now I do! Whoa, magic!
subtitles.english: Now I do! Whoa, magic!

subtitles.original: All right, let's see. Um...
subtitles.english: All right, let's see. Um...

subtitles.original: Yeah, okay. Time to read this letter.
subtitles.english: Yeah, okay. Time to read this letter.

subtitles.original:
So, I never would have expected
to ever be here
subtitles.english:
So, I never would have expected
to ever be here

subtitles.original: years before all this.
subtitles.english: years before all this.

subtitles.original:
And because of you guys,
I'm able to have this chance
subtitles.english:
And because of you guys,
I'm able to have this chance

subtitles.original: to experience so many new things
subtitles.english: to experience so many new things

subtitles.original: and meet so many people in just one lifetime.
subtitles.english: and meet so many people in just one lifetime.

subtitles.original:
So, thank you for helping me
break out of my shell,
subtitles.english:
So, thank you for helping me
break out of my shell,

subtitles.original:
and I hope we can continue
accomplishing great things together.
subtitles.english:
and I hope we can continue
accomplishing great things together.

subtitles.original: Uh, yeah. Yeah.
subtitles.english: Uh, yeah. Yeah.

subtitles.original:
Well, time to get that
sappy stuff out of the way. Um...
subtitles.english:
Well, time to get that
sappy stuff out of the way. Um...

subtitles.original: Okay, but before we end things off,
subtitles.english: Okay, but before we end things off,

subtitles.original: let's finish it off with a song. Let's go!
subtitles.english: let's finish it off with a song. Let's go!

subtitles.original:
And the final song is going to be
from one of my favorite animes
subtitles.english:
And the final song is going to be
from one of my favorite animes

subtitles.original: and it's going to be called Eternal Snow.
subtitles.english: and it's going to be called Eternal Snow.

subtitles.original: So please give it a listen. Thank you.
subtitles.english: So please give it a listen. Thank you.

subtitles.original: いつの間に...
subtitles.english: Before I knew it...

subtitles.original: 君のことを好きになって
subtitles.english: I've fallen in love with you.

subtitles.original: どれくらいたつのかな
subtitles.english: I wonder how much time has passed.

subtitles.original: 気持ち膨らんでゆくばかりで
subtitles.english: My feelings just keep growing,

subtitles.original: 君はこの想い気付いているのかな
subtitles.english: and I wonder if you've noticed these feelings.
